titleStmt.title: The great law of consideration: or a discourse, wherein the nature, usefulness, and absolute necessity of consideration, in order to a truly serious and religious life, is laid open: By Anthony Horneck, preacher at the Savoy.
titleStmt.author: Horneck, Anthony, 1641-1697.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by T.N. for Sam. Lowndes near the Savoy in the Strand,

notesStmt.note: The words "Nature, .. necessity" are bracketed together on title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
